gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.heading: A comprehensive set of comment analytics and insights for Jira
gettingStarted.description: Flowzira provides powerful, no-code custom fields and analytics to help you and your team understand and manage conversations in Jira work items. Get up and running in no time—no code required!

simple.title: Simple
simple.description: Effortlessly generate custom, calculated fields without any coding required.

commentAnalytics.title: Comment Analytics
commentAnalytics.description: Create various calculated fields to improve visibility and make work items more searchable. Fields are updated automatically!

dynamicInsights.title: Dynamic Insights
dynamicInsights.description: Custom field values are always up-to-date, so your searches and reports are accurate and actionable.

quickStart.title: Quick start
quickStart.description: Get started with Flowzira in just a few clicks:

steps.step1: Configure your custom fields in project settings
steps.step2: Add the fields to your work item view screens
steps.step3: Start analyzing your team's communication patterns

support.title: We are here to help
support.resourcesDescription: Check out these resources that will guide you through the simple process of setting up comment analytics and custom fields.

feedback.title: Let us know what you think
feedback.description: If you found Flowzira helpful, let us know! We welcome your feedback.

sync.title: Bulk Sync Custom Fields

description.globalAdmin: Use this tool to backfill calculated custom field values for work items across all projects. This is required if you want work items to have up-to-date values. Work items will automatically have the calculated values applied when comments are added or deleted.
description.projectAdmin: Use this tool to backfill calculated custom field values for all work items in this project. This is required if you want old work items to have up-to-date values. Work items will automatically have the calculated values applied when comments are added or deleted.

sync.licenseError: Sync functionality is disabled due to invalid license. Please ensure your license is active to use the sync feature.

infoMessage.globalAdmin: This sync tool can only process a maximum of 5,000 work items and prioritizes the most recent work items. Use JQL queries to filter work items from specific projects or work item types.
infoMessage.projectAdmin: This sync tool can only process a maximum of 5,000 work items and prioritizes the most recent work items. If your project has more than 5,000 work items, consider using JQL to filter the work items as needed.

placeholder.globalAdmin: Enter JQL query to specify which work items to sync
placeholder.projectAdmin: Enter JQL query to filter work items

helpText.globalAdmin: JQL query is required for global sync. Use project keys or other filters to specify which work items to process.
helpText.projectAdmin: Optional JQL query. Leave blank to process all work items in project. This filter can only be used to search for work items in this project.

status.syncResetSuccess: Sync state has been reset successfully
status.emergencyStopSuccess: ✅ Emergency stop completed: All syncs stopped and queue cleared

warnings.timeWarning: The sync process can take over 30 minutes to complete. If the sync fails to complete, it can be reattempted after 1 hour.

confirmations.forceReset: Are you sure you want to force reset? This will clear all sync state and history.
confirmations.emergencyStop: ⚠️ EMERGENCY STOP: This will immediately stop ALL running sync processes and clear the queue. Use this only if syncs are stuck or processing duplicates. Are you sure?

license.errorMessage: The license for this app is inactive. The values of the custom fields will not automatically calculate without an active license and data could be lost. This should be resolved as soon as possible. Please contact your Jira administrator.
